main.description: A document record for cross-platform content discovery and verification.

site.description: Required URI for parent site or publication (https:// or at://). Use https:// for loose documents. Avoid trailing slashes.

path.description: Optional path, combined with site url value to construct a full url to the document. Prepend with a leading slash.

description.description: Optional brief description or excerpt of the document

coverImage.description: Optional image to use as the documents cover. Less than 1MB in size.

content.description: Optional open union to construct content within the record. Can be extended with other lexicons to define any content format.

textContent.description: Optional plaintext representation of the documents contents. Useful for search and other cases.

bskyPostRef.description: Optional strong reference to a Bluesky post. Useful to keep track of comments off-platform.

tags.description: Optional array of strings used to tag/categorize the document. Avoid prepending tags with hashtags.

publishedAt.description: Required timestamp of the documents publication

updatedAt.description: Optional timestamp of the documents last edit
